page.title: 15Transport in Bromp on Swale
page.content: In our D_Block the most common transport is the{car.}The people who live on Gatherley road see a lot of cars coming off the A.1. A boy on Gatherley road counted how many cars went up and down in a hour. Sixty six cars went up towards the A.1 and seventy eight from the A.1.So altogether there were 144 cars that went past. The cubs in the village also did a count on how many cars went past in an hour the King William public house in the middle of the village. They saw about 69 cars.Can you tell the difference in the two places?. For people with out cars or for school children there are about 6 {buses}a day going through Brompton to Scorton or Richmond. Some people use{bicycles}mainly to go to work.
